main.title: Benefits
main.sub: Redeem the tokens you earned to enjoy these exclusive benefits within the community.

head.title: Token for good
head.metaDesc: Token for Good is powered with blockchain technology, bringing value and transparency to alumni communities.

section1.title: Celebrate commitment!
section1.p1: The ambition of Token for Good is to promote actions with positive impacts, to stimulate exchanges within a community, and to give meaning to sharing !
section1.p2: In return for their contribution, members receive digital tokens and become beneficiaries of services and numerous advantages.
section1.p3: With its collaborative platform, Token for Good offers an innovative solution for community engagement and fits into a « sharing economy » that celebrates commitment !

section2.title: Why joining Token for Good?

listContent.text: Meet alumni who listen to you
Take advantage of feedback and share knowledge
Develop your skills
Promote a commitment to partners with a mission Access to inspiring events
Benefit from various targeted services
Strengthen a community that looks like you
Meet alumni who share your interests
Cross experiences and share your knowledg Develop your skills
Learning throughout life
Access inspiring events
Benefit from various targeted services
Strengthen a community that looks like you
Federate your stakeholders within a community that resembles them
Promote knowledge sharing and skills development
Secure and certify the transmission of know-how
Access to a talent pool and a network of experts
Promote a commitment to partners with a mission
Develop contributory and innovative tools with blockchain technology
Federate and energize your alumni community
Allow students and graduates to interact and develop their skills
Encourage your stakeholders to engage in a virtuous dynamic
Measure the positive impact of community interactions
Strengthen the school's employer brand
Develop contributory and innovative tools with blockchain technology

section2.subtitle: Ils ont rejoint Token for Good

comments.name: Jérôme Pasquet
comments.comment: “I find Token for Good initiative interesting to use digital technologies to allow a large number of t4g Alumni (including international ones) to connect with students.”

comments.name: Laeticia Caliez
comments.comment: “Mentoring is a skills accelerator. It allows you to connect with the specific needs of your professional career and to seek out others’ experiences more directly.”

section3.title: An involved community
section3.p1: By being part of the community and contributing to the Token For Good platform, you will help other students or alumni, and you can also increase your visibility with future employers, access events, obtain certifications and many other benefits.

quote.quote: “My mama always said, life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get...”
quote.author: Forrest Gump

head.title: Contact - T4G
head.metaDesc: Token for Good is powered with blockchain technology, bringing value and transparency to alumni communities.

main.title: Contact
main.p: Get quick information about Token For Good by contacting us using the form below.

head.title: About - T4G
head.metaDesc: Token for Good is powered with blockchain technology, bringing value and transparency to alumni communities.

section2.title: Our History
section2.text:
Token for Good is a start-up powered by t4g, and resulting from its ECOS 2025 Strategic Plan. 
 Integrated into the Centrale-t4g-Ensa Incubator since September 2022, Token for Good is led by Laure Diakov, EMBA 201 t4g graduate, ambassador of the Alumni Thematic Group, from which emerged the idea for this collaborative platform. The team has grown with Stéphane Courant, Product Owner, and skills of UX designer, Lead and Front Development, Community manager, … 
 Token for Good is part of a large network of 8,000 students on 14 campuses in France and abroad, and 47,000 alumni.

section3.title: Our Vision
section3.text: “Enhancing the sharing of skills and knowledge in a virtuous circle where each contributor becomes a beneficiary within a committed community.”

values.text: Token for Good's blockchain system automatically values the contributioncounterparty-services value chain and measures its positive impacts.
Token for Good relies on a collaborative platform that promotes collaboration within a trusted community.
Token for Good uses carbon neutral technology (take a look at Poygon green manifest, our blockchain).

main.sub1: What is happening in our community. View the latest numbers of activities, dynamics, and discover the technology behind the scenes.

section2.text1: All positive-impact actions of our community members, and related token movements, are recorded on the blockchain as transactions. This all happens via a predefined set of rules defined by Token for Good and executed by a software program that is stored on the blockchain, called a ‘smart contract’. All Token for Good transactions happen in the context of this smart contract and are recorded on the blockchain in such a way that these are tamper-proof and fully traceable by anyone.
section2.text4: Token for Good is using the Polygon blockchain. Polygonscan is the tool that allows a fully transparent view on all transactions happening on Polygon. It serves as a search engine for all data on the Polygon network, and gives info on all details of the transactions. All Token for Good transactions can be tracked on the blockchain using Polygonscan.

section2.text3:
of your actions with the community members will be valued by utility tokens. You will spend them choosing one in available service list...
but many more services to come soon with local and corporate partners: stay tuned!

section3.text3: stay at tour disposal at the bottom of the page to discuss and share comments with the team !
